child2: With length greater than or equal to /number/ characters
BNF: Users must create passwords with length greater than or equal to 8 characters.
BNF Base: Users must create passwords with length greater than or equal to /number/ characters

child2: With a character in the set of /char set/
BNF: Users must create passwords with a character in the set of numbers, special characters (unspec).
BNF Base: Users must create passwords with a character in the set of /char set/

child5: A character repeated /number/ or more times
BNF: Users must not create passwords in the set of strings with a character repeated 5 or more times.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords in the set of strings with a character repeated /number/ or more times

child2: With a character in the set of /char set/
BNF: Users must not create passwords with a character in the set of control or non-printable characters (unspec).
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords with a character in the set of /char set/

BNF: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of vendor default passwords.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of vendor default passwords

BNF: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of proper nouns.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of proper nouns

BNF: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of dictionary words.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of dictionary words

BNF: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of dictionary words in reverse.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of dictionary words in reverse

BNF: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of addresses or other locations.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of addresses or other locations

BNF: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of birthdays or other dates.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of birthdays or other dates

BNF: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of strings with word or number patterns (unspec).
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords with a substring in the set of strings with word or number patterns (unspec)

BNF: Users must not communicate passwords except in an emergency.
BNF Base: Users must not communicate passwords except in an emergency

BNF: Users must change passwords immediately if shared.
BNF Base: Users must change passwords immediately if shared

child3: In clear text in an unsecure location
BNF: Users must not store passwords in writing in clear text in an unsecure location.
BNF Base: Users must not store passwords in writing in clear text in an unsecure location

BNF: Users must not store passwords online in automated scripts.
BNF Base: Users must not store passwords online in automated scripts

BNF: Users must not communicate passwords by mail without encryption.
BNF Base: Users must not communicate passwords by mail without encryption

BNF: Users must not communicate passwords by phone mail.
BNF Base: Users must not communicate passwords by phone mail

child3: Mail accompanied by the user ID
BNF: Users must not communicate passwords by mail accompanied by the user ID.
BNF Base: Users must not communicate passwords by mail accompanied by the user ID

BNF: Users must not create passwords in the set of passwords to an outside system.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords in the set of passwords to an outside system

BNF: Users should not communicate passwords by any network without encryption.
BNF Base: Users should not communicate passwords by any network without encryption

child3: Internet or wide-area network without encryption
BNF: Users must not communicate passwords by Internet or wide-area network without encryption.
BNF Base: Users must not communicate passwords by Internet or wide-area network without encryption

BNF: Users must change passwords before 90 days.
BNF Base: Users must change passwords before /number/ days

BNF: Users must change passwords immediately if compromised.
BNF Base: Users must change passwords immediately if compromised

BNF: Users must change passwords immediately if shared.
BNF Base: Users must change passwords immediately if shared

BNF: Users must change passwords immediately if found non-compliant.
BNF Base: Users must change passwords immediately if found non-compliant

BNF: Users must change passwords immediately if directed by management.
BNF Base: Users must change passwords immediately if directed by management

BNF: Users must not create passwords in the set of their last 2 years of passwords.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords in the set of their last /number/ years of passwords

BNF: Users must not create passwords in the set of their last 8 passwords.
BNF Base: Users must not create passwords in the set of their last /number/ passwords

child4: Administrative unlock or a /number/ /time unit/ lockout
BNF: Users must not fail to authenticate 4 times to avoid administrative unlock or a 3 minute lockout.
BNF Base: Users must not fail to authenticate /number/ times to avoid administrative unlock or a /number/ /time unit/ lockout
